author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds tests for https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-common/pull/21 .

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/48939

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1578

#### PR validation:

With https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-common/pull/21 the tests succeed.
title: Add tests for `cmsTraceFunction` for various failures of the traced program
